sentences.sContent: She vacillates between men twice her age and men younger than she.
sentences.sCn: 她在两个男人之间摇摆不定，一个年龄比她大一倍，一个比她小。

sentences.sContent: We cannot vacillate on the question of the party's leadership.
sentences.sCn: 在党的领导权问题上我们不能动摇。

remMethod.val: vacill (摇摆) + ate → 摇摆不定

words.tran: 犹豫不决的；游移的；摇摆不定的

trans.tranCn: 摆动， 震荡； 摇摆不定， 犹豫不决
trans.tranOther: If you vacillate between two alternatives or choices, you keep changing your mind
